home.title: YumYum - Online Two-Player Strategy Board Game
home.description: YumYum is a free online two-player strategy game inspired by Gobblet Gobblers. Play local, vs AI, or online matches anytime, anywhere!

local.title: Local 2P Game - YumYum
local.description: Play against a friend on the same device! Experience classic board game strategy - gobble smaller pieces and get three in a row to win.

ai.title: VS Computer - YumYum
ai.description: Challenge the AI opponent! Test your strategic skills and beat the computer in this classic board game.

online.title: Online Lobby - YumYum
online.description: Create or join a room to play against players worldwide in real-time! Features ELO rating and leaderboard system.

onlineGame.title: Online Game - YumYum
onlineGame.description: Online match in progress - compete with your opponent in real-time strategy!

tutorial.title: Tutorial - YumYum
tutorial.description: Interactive tutorial to learn the game rules! Understand board setup, piece movement, and gobbling mechanics.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard - YumYum
leaderboard.description: View global player rankings! Daily, weekly, monthly, and all-time charts - see who's the top player.

about.title: About - YumYum
about.description: Learn about YumYum's story, technical architecture, and creator information.
